typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 keyGenerate(output(sk as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
DerivedColumn1 window(over(dummy),
	asc(sk, true),
	prevAndCurr = lag(title,1)+'-'+last(title),
		nextAndCurr = lead(title,1)+'-'+last(title)) ~> Window1
SurrogateKey1 derive(dummy = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
Window1 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		year,
		sk,
		prevAndCurr,
		nextAndCurr
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
